titles.title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 12/11/2001--Introduced. Amends the Federal Power Act to direct the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend until December 31, 2002, the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Pennsylvania.Provides for license reinstatement if the license for the project has expired before the date of enactment of this Act.
